content.text: What should I pack in my hospital bag?

Start with the basics: comfy clothes, toiletries, and a phone charger. For baby: a cozy outfit and swaddle for the ride home. Don't forget snacks and a water bottleâ€”you'll thank me later! I just packed mine last week!
How can I balance work and pregnancy?

Set clear boundaries and prioritize rest. Break tasks into smaller goals, and don't hesitate to lean on your team or ask for flexibility when needed. I've been managing this myself and find that a daily checklist really helps!
What are the best eco-friendly baby products?

Start with organic cotton onesies, biodegradable diapers, and non-toxic baby bottles. Brands like Earth Mama and Green Sprouts are fantastic for sustainable parenting! I've already stocked up on these for my own baby.
Whatâ€™s happening in my pregnancy at 24 weeks?

At 24 weeks, your baby is the size of a cantaloupe! Their taste buds are developing, and you may notice more baby kicks. It's a great time to start thinking about your birth plan! I'm also 24 weeks, and I'm loving feeling those little movements!
